name: market for goods wagon | goods wagon | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3015/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'goods wagon', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This product is a mobile infrastructure that is used in the service of transportation. The goods wagon represents the infrastructure used to transport cargo used for rail transportation. Since the vehicle park of rail wagons is extremely inhomogeneous, this item is delivering the production of an average wagon.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'goods wagon',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'goods wagon',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/30:Manufacture of other transport equipment/302:Manufacture of railway locomotives and rolling stock/3020:Manufacture of railway locomotives and rolling stock
